comment: If ` B ( x ) ` is a family of elements of ` U ` and the index set ` A ` is an element of ` U ` , then the indexed union ` U_ x e. A B ` is also an element of ` U ` , where ` U ` is a Grothendieck universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jun-2013.)
